mapper.insert: insert into store_info (productClassifyId, merchantId, storeName, describe, advertisingPicUrl, createTime, updateTime, status,STJStatus, payStatus) values (#{productclassifyid}, #{merchantid}, #{storename}, #{describe}, #{advertisingpicurl}, #{createtime}, #{updatetime}, #{status},#{STJStatus},#{paystatus})
mapper.select: select si.* from store_info si where si.merchantId in( select DISTINCT(pm.merchantId) from productinfo_manage pm where pm.productClassifyId in(select pc2.id from product_classify pc2 where pc2.parentId = #{productClassifyId}) )
select * from store_info where storeName like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{storeName}), '%')
